c1.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
c1.descriptionraw: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.
c1.description: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

c2.name: Right of Final Interpretation
c2.descriptionraw: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.
c2.description: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

c3.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
c3.descriptionraw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Signed Edict</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Signed Edict by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Supreme Amnesty
c4.descriptionraw:
When <color=#FFD780FF>Done Deal</color> is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

c5.name: Abiding Affidavit
c5.descriptionraw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Done Deal</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Done Deal by 3.

c6.name: Extra Clause
c6.descriptionraw: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.
c6.description: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.
